bill.summary:
Farm to Table Safety Act
This bill modifies the Department of Agriculture (USDA) food safety education program.
Specifically, the bill requires USDA to (1) include farm workers in the program; and (2) expand the scope of the program to include practices that prevent bacterial contamination of food, methods of identifying sources of food contamination, and other means of decreasing food contamination.
